resources:
TV Chefs Quiz
Settings Name How well do you know these English TV Chefs, take this Quiz and you\'ll know!
Q1: TV chef with an abiding interest in football is Gordon Ramsay. Well known for his swearing, and one of the most successful celebrity chefs ever, which ones are his series? (there are more than one good answer)
Kitchen Confidential The F Word The Naked Chef Hell\'s Kitchen //*
Q2: Which celebrity chefs have Michelin-starred restaurant? (there are more than one good answer)
Gordon Ramsay //* Heston Blumenthal //* Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall Nigella Lawson
Q3: TV chef and writer Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall has presented his popular shows from which charming location?
The Hollow River Cottage //* The Rose Garden Fearnley House
Q4: Nigella Lawson is a prolific writer. Starting her career in journalism, she then turned to presenting her own cookery programmes on television, which have also met with acclaim. Do you know the name of her first series?
Nigella Eats Nigella Bites //* Nigella Cooks Nigella Bakes
Q5: Which celebrity chef, born in 1975, is known as: The Naked Chef?
Keith Floyd Nigel Slater Jamie Oliver //* Heston Blumenthal
Q6: Which celebrity chef\'s iconic main course is: Beef Wellington?
Nigella Lawson Gordon Ramsay //* Jamie Oliver Heston Blumenthal
Q7: How many children Jamie Oliver has?
Submit answers
Reset
